import glob import numpy ######################################################
def GetFiles(filename): # gets list of vtus and sorts them into ascending time order
filelist_not_sorted = glob.glob('./'+filename+'*.pvtu') vtu_nos_not_sorted = [] for file in filelist_not_sorted: if "checkpoint" in file: filelist_not_sorted.remove(file) else: vtu_nos_not_sorted.append(int(file.split('.pvtu')[0].split('_')[-1]))
vtu_nos_sorted = numpy.argsort(vtu_nos_not_sorted) filelist_sorted = [] for i in vtu_nos_sorted: filelist_sorted.append(filelist_not_sorted[i])
return filelist_sorted
